p: After purification and recrystallization of the EO using our patented method (n 0 PI-0505343-9/28/11/2007), the zerumbone purity was estimated through HPLC analysis (Accela High Speed LC, Thermo Scientific®), using a column Hypersil Gold (50 × 2,1 mm) and a mobile phase methanol:water (85:15, v/v) at 1 mL/min. The identification was done by comparing the retention time of the peaks with those standard solutes in HPLC and confirmed by UV-absorption spectrum (~ 252 nm).
